name: Exotac nanoSTRIKER XL Ultra-portable Firestarter
description: This tiny fire striker fits on a key ring or in a survival kit. It's waterproof and well-made to ensure there are hot sparks when you need them.Anodized aluminum body.Replaceable ferrocerium rod works when wet and generates sparks at nearly 3000°C.Each rod provides more than 3000 strikes.Tungsten carbide striker is ultra-sharp and user resharpenable.Dimensions are 9.2 x 1cm.Includes key ring, wrist lanyard, and user manual.
